accc3823-7800-49bb-91b1-1189946dcb0b.workflow:
start: Start
    Search for apartments
    ask_for_specific_needs: Subgoal: ask for specific needs
        Description: inquire the user about the number of bedrooms, price, floor, elevator demand, or other needs.
        Call searchApartment to find matching apartments, and check the availability of matching apartments based on the returned is_find
        if Apartment is not available then
            inform_user_to_modify_info: Subgoal: inform the user to modify the information
                Description: inform the user that no apartment meets the given criteria, and ask if the user is willing to adjust the apartment criteria
                if Yes then
                    goto ask_for_specific_needs
                else
                    apologize_to_user: Subgoal: apologize to the user
                        Description: tell the user there is no suitable apartment and apologize to the user
                endif
        else
            inform_about_flat: Subgoal: inform about the flat and get opinions.
                Description: inform the user about the apartment according to the returned apartment_message and ask if the user is satisfied with the apartment
                if User is not satisfied then
                    ask_desire_to_see: Ask if the user would like to see the apartment before making a decision
                    if Desire to see then
                        confirm_view_process: The user needs to wait a moment, and the apartment viewing process is being confirmed
                    else
                        ask_about_other_apartments: Ask if the user wants to know about other apartments
                        if User wants to know then
                            goto ask_for_specific_needs
                        else
                            goto apologize_to_user
                        endif
                    endif
                else
                    ask_rent_or_look: Ask if the user rents the apartment now or takes a look first
                    if Rent Now then
                        check_if_flat_rented: Subgoal: check if the flat is rented.
                            Description: call apartmentSigning, and check if the lease is successful based on the returned is_apart
                            if Apartment rental succeeded then
                                notify_rental_success: Notify the user that the apartment is successfully rented
                            else
                                ask_for_deposit: Subgoal: let the user make a deposit.
                                    Description: inform the user that the apartment rental has failed, possibly due to the unpaid deposit or the unsigned occupancy agreement
                            endif
                    else
                        goto confirm_view_process
                    endif
                endif
        endif

a33a0c30-08a6-4aca-9b53-30c2a86bbb87.scenario_name: Make an appointment to view a home
a33a0c30-08a6-4aca-9b53-30c2a86bbb87.workflow:
Start:
    View an apartment
    Ask if the user already has a satisfied flat?
    if answer is NO:
        The user conducts an apartment search and then schedules a viewing
        goto Start
    else if answer is Yes:
        Subgoal: verify the room information
        call getRoomInfo to verify and get room information
        if room_code is empty or no desired room number:
            The user conducts an apartment search and then schedules a viewing
            goto Start
        else:
            Subgoal: confirm viewing times
            call fixTime to confirm the time
            if observable_time is empty:
                Subgoal: ask the user to reselect
                Inform the user: no viewing time available
                Ask the user to: Reschedule, View other apartments, or Wait for another time
                if Reschedule:
                    goto Subgoal: confirm viewing times
                else if View other apartments:
                    goto Start
                else if Wait for another time:
                    The user should make a call when arriving
            else:
                Subgoal: let the user provide viewing times
                Based on observable_time, fix the time with user
                Collect parameters: go_look_time, user_phone
                Inform the user: Come to the community gate in time, the salesman will wait
                If necessary, contact the salesman through salesman_phone

daa55e31-92ff-409f-8222-847fe8db90ac.workflow:
start: Start
  Apartment fee payment? -> yes -> identify_user
  
identify_user: Current goal: Determine user identity
  Description: Ask for the user's phone number and call identityChecks to query the user's identity. Determine whether the user is a resident of the apartment based on the returned is_service.
  Resident of the apartment? -> yes -> ask_payment_now
  Resident of the apartment? -> no -> re_provide_phone
  
re_provide_phone: Current goal: Let the user re-provide the phone number
  Description: Inform the user that we have checked his/her identity through the mobile number, finding out that the user does not live in this apartment. Ask if the user would like to re-provide the mobile number so that we can check again for him/her.
  Provide the mobile number again? -> yes -> identify_user
  Provide the mobile number again? -> no -> say_goodbye
  
say_goodbye: Current goal: Say goodbye to the user
  Description: Inform the user that we only serve the residents of the apartment, and say goodbye to the user
  
ask_payment_now: Current goal: Ask if the user wants to pay for the apartment now
  Description: Inform the user of the fee to be paid based on the returned is_fee, and ask if the user wants to pay now or later.
  Pay now? -> yes -> check_payment_status
  Pay now? -> no -> remind_pay_early

remind_pay_early: Current goal: Remind the user to pay as early as possible
  Description: Inform the user that he/she can pay later. At the same time, the user is advised to pay the fee as early as possible
  
check_payment_status: Current goal: Determine whether the fee has been paid
  Description: The user can click on the logistics fee on Gulfstream Apartments' public account and then pay. Call paymentFees to query the payment progress. Judge whether the fee has been paid or not paid based on the returned is_empty.
  Fee paid? -> yes -> inform_paid
  Fee paid? -> no -> remind_to_pay
  
inform_paid: Inform the user that the fee has been paid in full, and say goodbye to the user

remind_to_pay: Current goal: Remind the user to pay
  Description: Tell the user that the fee has not been paid in full. Inform the amount of unpaid fees based on returned whone_amoun, and remind the user to pay as soon as possible.

68cc0227-0585-4b7b-9982-cfb360cf97f3.workflow:
start:
    call confirmationIdentity
    if is_person then
        goto confirmBillingInformation
    else
        goto confirmIdentityFailed

confirmIdentityFailed:
    inform user identity not found
    ask user to change phone
    if willing to change phone then
        goto start
    else
        goto endInquiry

confirmBillingInformation:
    ask for billing date
    call billingInquiry
    if is_find then
        goto billingInformationFound
    else
        goto billingInformationNotFound

billingInformationFound:
    inform user of billing info
    goto end

billingInformationNotFound:
    inform user bill not found
    ask if change date
    if wants to change date then
        goto confirmBillingInformation
    else
        goto endInquiry

endInquiry:
    inform user can't conduct inquiry
    end

end:
    // Process ends

b7bb32bf-0d2b-4428-8234-b8c61a266740.workflow:
start:
    Reservation of moving service
    Ask if destination is in the same city
    if (same city) then
        Ask user to accept moving fee
        if (accepts moving fee) then
            Inquire moving time
            if (moving time is feasible) then
                Inform service will be carried at the desired time
            else
                Ask to choose moving time again
                goto Inquire moving time
            endif
        else
            Say goodbye to the user
        endif
    else
        Ask if changes are required
        if (need to change) then
            Ask user to accept moving fee
            if (accepts moving fee) then
                Inquire moving time
                if (moving time is feasible) then
                    Inform service will be carried at the desired time
                else
                    Ask to choose moving time again
                    goto Inquire moving time
                endif
            else
                Say goodbye to the user
            endif
        else
            Say goodbye to the user
        endif
    endif
end

9bf56f1e-d44b-4728-84f1-0e61209b2a89.workflow:
-> Start
    -> Call API to determine whether the property is on the expiration date.
        Ask the user for the corresponding type and name of damaged and lost property,
        Call verifyInsurance, and determine if the property insurance is valid based on the returned is_date.
        -> Insurance invalid
            -> Inform the user that the insurance is not valid and compensation cannot be provided.
            -> END
        -> Insurance valid
            -> Judge whether the damaged and lost property is in the insurance coverage or not based on the returned is_wheel.
                -> Insurance in coverage
                    -> Call API to decide whether the audit passed or not.
                        Call submitClaimForm to perform a compensation audit,
                        Judge whether the audit is passed based on the returned is_passing.
                        -> Audit is passed
                            -> Inform the user that the audit has passed.
                                Tell the user of the amount of compensation based on the returned is_amount,
                                and the compensation will arrive in three days.
                            -> END
                        -> Audit is not passed
                            -> Ask if the claim needs to be readjusted.
                                Let the user know why the audit failed based on the returned is_reason,
                                and ask if the claim needs to be readjusted.
                                -> Needed
                                    -> [Go back to "Call API to determine whether the property is on the expiration date."]
                                -> Not needed
                                    -> Apologize to the user
                                    -> END
                -> Insurance not in coverage
                    -> Tell the user that this property is not in our compensation scope.
                    -> END

303519f3-9d93-4a47-b23e-e31ed7153757.workflow:
Start
  |--> Gas Maintenance
        |--> Inquire about the maintenance location
              |--> IF Within Homeowner Meter
                    |--> Inform the user of the self-maintenance option
                          |--> IF Request our maintenance
                                |--> Request a technician for home service
                          |--> ELSE IF Request third party maintenance
                                |--> User to contact independently
                                      |--> IF Available
                                            |--> Tell the user we will perform the inspection on the 7th business day.
                                      |--> ELSE
                                            |--> Confirm visit timing.
              |--> ELSE IF Outside of Homeowner Meter
                    |--> Request a technician for home service

71395c1c-1e1a-46d9-90be-08424c7dfe76.workflow:
start: Start
    if (Gas fee inquiry) then (WT001)
    else (Gas bill payment) then (WT004)

WT001: Subgoal: check gas bills
    Description: Call lookMeter to query the gas cost.
    If the returned is_success is true, the query is successful.
        if (Successful query) then (WT002)
        else (Unsuccessful query) then (WT007)

WT002: Subgoal: Inform gas information to the user
    Description: Tell the user the money left and ask 
    if the user needs a more specific list of expenses based on returned expense_residual.
        if (Need specific list) then (WT003)
        else (Do not need specific list) then (WT006)

WT003: Subgoal: tell the list of expenses
    Description: Inquire what months of the list the user needs, 
    and inform the list of expenses based on returned expense_dict.

WT004: Subgoal: Get the payment link
    Description: Call getPayLink and ask for the user's information.
    If the returned is_success is true, the acquisition is successful.
    Provide the user with the payment link based on the returned pay_link.
        if (Acquisition is successful) then (WT005)
        else (Acquisition is unsuccessful) then (WT007)

WT005: Subgoal: Check whether the user has paid
    Description: Ask if the user has already paid.
    If so, it is recommended to check whether the gas balance has been received.
    If not, inform the user to pay within 10 minutes.

WT006: Thanks for the call, and goodbye to the user

WT007: Subgoal: ask the user to re-enter the information
    Description: The user's information is incorrect, need to enter again.

334e3f27-1c0f-4d66-8869-acb64a86439c.workflow:
start: Start
  -> confirm_user_info

confirm_user_info: Subgoal: Confirm the user's account information
  Description: Call lookMeter to query the user's gas charge, determine whether the returned is_success is true. If it is false, tell the user to re-enter the information.
  -> query_successful, confirm_user_info

query_successful: Subgoal: Judge whether there is balance or not
  Description: Determine if the balance is sufficient based on the returned expense_residual.
  -> balance_sufficient, balance_insufficient

balance_sufficient: Subgoal: Decide if there is announcement
  Description: Judge if there is a notice based on the returned announcement.
  -> has_announcement, no_announcement

has_announcement: Subgoal: Notify the user announcement information
  Description: Inform the user of the announcement information based on the returned announcement. Tell the user that it is normal to be without gas temporarily, and advise using equipment that doesn't require gas.
  -> END

no_announcement: Inquire if there is gas around?
  -> gas_available, gas_unavailable

gas_available: Subgoal: Tell that there is a failure
  Description: Inform that the device may be malfunctioning, let someone get it repaired.
  -> END

gas_unavailable: Subgoal: speculate the possibility of no gas
  Description: Tell the user that everything is displayed as normal, only there is no gas at the user's home. Possible reasons for no gas can be speculated, like sudden maintenance or the main meter being broken. The user can contact the property to solve the problem.
  -> END

balance_insufficient: Subgoal: Let the user know the balance is insufficient
  Description: Through inquiries, the reason for no gas is insufficient balance. The user needs to pay the bill in time.
  -> END

079403cb-e17b-4d96-bbf9-60c7a5582235.scenario_name: Request the user to change the workstation
079403cb-e17b-4d96-bbf9-60c7a5582235.workflow:
start
  Request the user to change the workstation
  getUserInfo -> back_code
  
  if back_code == Correct identity
    obtainApplicationResults -> is_pass
    
    if is_pass == True
      Ask if the user wants to change the workstation
      if Wants to change
        deskChange -> replace_time
        Remind the user to change the workstation as soon as possible
        [END]
      else
        Collect reasons for not replacing
        [END]
    else
      Notify that the application failed
      [END]
      
  else
    Inform of mistaken identity
    [END]

2a3d66de-3a03-428b-ae61-8c5ef7ee6f22.workflow:
-> START
    -> Is the caller Mr. Wang Zhenyan?
        -> YES:
            -> Does Mr. Wang have time for a survey?
                -> WILLING:
                    -> Is Mr. Wang satisfied with our service?
                        -> SATISFIED:
                            [Thank Mr. Wang for his high evaluation and assure him of maintaining good service.]
                        -> UNSATISFIED:
                            [Inform Mr. Wang that we will improve our service and apologize.]
                -> UNWILLING:
                    -> Can Mr. Wang inform us when he will be available?
                        -> CAN TELL:
                            [Ask for Mr. Wang's available time. Inform him we'll call back at a suitable time.]
                        -> CANNOT TELL:
                            [Apologize and say goodbye to Mr. Wang.]
        -> NO:
            [Apologize for the wrong call and inform the user about the mistake.]

fb31b7e3-1303-45d7-8359-cba9208cb2eb.workflow:
start: Start
Take part in the promotion -> verify_callee_identity

verify_callee_identity: Current goal: Confirm callee identity
Description: Ask if the user is Mr. Wang Zhenyan.
Is the user Mr. Wang Zhenyan? -> yes -> inquire_availability
Is the user Mr. Wang Zhenyan? -> no -> wrong_call

wrong_call: Current goal: Inform that there is a wrong call
Description: Apologize to the user and explain it is a wrong call. End the flow.

inquire_availability: Current goal: Inquire if the user has time to participate in the promotion
Description: Inform that this is Mr. Rice. Recently there is a promotion where all dishes are 6% off. Ask if the user has time to come.
Have time to come? -> yes -> ask_need_appointment
Have time to come? -> no -> provide_promo_window

provide_promo_window: Current goal: Provide promotion window and re-invite
Description: Inform that the promotion starts next Monday and ends next Sunday. Ask again if the user has time to come over within that window.
Have time within the window? -> yes -> ask_need_appointment
Have time within the window? -> no -> apologize_end

apologize_end: Current goal: Say sorry to the user
Description: Apologize for the inconvenience and end the conversation.

ask_need_appointment: Current goal: Ask if the user needs to make an appointment
Description: Tell the user that making an appointment in advance will skip queuing for the promotion. Ask if an appointment is needed.
Need an appointment? -> yes -> choose_appointment_timing
Need an appointment? -> no -> inform_queue

inform_queue: Current goal: Inform queue-on-arrival participation
Description: Inform the user they can queue on arrival to participate in the promotion.

choose_appointment_timing: Current goal: Inquire about appointment timing
Description: Ask whether the user wants to make an appointment now or later.
Make an appointment now? -> yes -> call_userReservation
Make an appointment now? -> no -> appointment_later_notice

appointment_later_notice: Current goal: Remind to arrange appointment later
Description: Inform the user to contact the restaurant by the following Monday to arrange the appointment.

call_userReservation: Current goal: Call API to determine whether the appointment is successful
Description: Obtain the user’s ID number and name, and call userReservation. Determine success based on the returned is_reserce.
Appointment successful? -> yes -> appointment_success
Appointment successful? -> no -> appointment_failed

appointment_success: Current goal: Confirm appointment success
Description: Inform the user that the appointment has been successfully made.

appointment_failed: Current goal: Tell that the appointment failed and retry
Description: Inform the user the appointment did not succeed (possibly due to errors in the ID number or name). Ask the user to re-provide the ID number and name, then retry.
Re-provide ID and name? -> yes -> call_userReservation

a30c11b7-ec42-4020-aa11-87ce92f50518.workflow:
start
    -> Launch the meeting
    -> Confirm the meeting feasibility
        -> inquire the user for meeting information based on scheduleMeeting
        -> call scheduleMeeting
        -> confirm if the meeting is feasible
    
    if (Meeting is available) then
        -> Notify the meeting is feasible
            -> tell the user that the meeting is feasible
            -> send a text message to make contact
            -> ask if the user needs a meeting link?
            
        if (Link needed) then
            -> Ask the user if the reminder is needed
                if (Yes) then
                    -> Collect parameters: contact_time
                    -> Notify the user that the reminder will be given in advance
                else (No need to inform)
                    -> The user is invited to participate in the meeting on time
                endif
        else (No link needed)
            -> Provide the user with an entry link according to the returned join_link
            -> Ask the user if the reminder is needed
                [same decision process as above]
        endif
        
    else (Meeting is unavailable)
        -> inform the user of reasons
            -> inform the user of the cause of failure
            -> notify the user who cannot attend the meeting
        -> Ask if the user wants to adjust the meeting content or force the meeting to start
            if (Start meeting forcibly) then
                -> Call scheduleMeeting, set up a meeting forcibly
                -> go back to "Notify the meeting is feasible"
            else (Adjust meeting content)
                -> go back to "Confirm the meeting feasibility"
            endif
    endif
end

23e2583a-74c5-4caa-8137-6d0dca3506fe.workflow:
start: Start
    cancel_dingtalk_meeting -> confirm_meeting_status
    
confirm_meeting_status: Subgoal: confirm the meeting status.
    Description: call inspectionMeeting to check meetings, determine whether the meeting has started or not based on the returned is_start
    meeting_starts -> determine_cancel_meeting
    meeting_does_not_start -> guide_user_to_cancel
    
determine_cancel_meeting: Determine whether the meeting can be canceled based on the returned is_quit
    meeting_cannot_be_canceled -> find_out_reason
    meeting_can_be_canceled -> inform_cancellation_consequence
    
find_out_reason: Find out the reason why the meeting can't be canceled is mobile phone issues or network connection issues according to the returned is_reason
    mobile_phone_issues -> ask_user_to_use_computer
    network_connection_issues -> require_user_to_check_network
    
ask_user_to_use_computer: Subgoal: ask the user to use a computer.
    Description: inform the user that DingTalk on mobile phones may have some bugs or compatibility issues, which will lead to uncanceled meetings, and the user is invited to try to log in the account using the PC DingTalk and then cancel the meeting.
    
require_user_to_check_network: Subgoal: require the user to check the network
    Description: mention that the network connected with the user's device is unstable, which may result in the inability to cancel the meeting. And advise the user to try to connect to other networks or restart network devices. Then try to cancel the appointment again.
    
guide_user_to_cancel: Guide the user to open DingTalk to find the scheduled meeting on the home page, enter the meeting details interface and select Delete to cancel the meeting.
    
inform_cancellation_consequence: Inform that once a meeting is canceled, it cannot be changed. Ask if the user is sure to cancel the meeting
    user_does_not_confirm -> suggest_user_to_think
    user_confirms -> judge_user_identity
    
suggest_user_to_think: Suggest that the user can think carefully before replying
    
judge_user_identity: Judge whether the user's identity is the meeting host based on the returned is_main
    yes -> click_end_meeting
    no -> consult_host_for_ending_meeting
    
click_end_meeting: Click end meeting button to cancel the meeting
    
consult_host_for_ending_meeting: The user can ask the meeting host if he/she can end the meeting. If the host agrees, the meeting can be ended

118f7450-5f7a-499b-82f3-c05f25d3a42b.workflow:
start: Start
check_flights: Check flights
inquire_user_for_info: Inquire the user for departure city and date, call planeSearch, and confirm if flight information can be found based on the returned plan_dict
inform_no_flights: Inform the user that there are no available flights on the route and ask the user to reselect
notify_flight_found: Notify the user that a suitable flight can be found, display the list of flights found based on the returned plan_dict, and ask the user for preferred flights
inquire_flight_ID: Inquire the user for flight ID, and tell the user of the flight price based on the returned plan_price
ask_continue_search: Ask whether the user wants to continue searching?
say_goodbye: Say goodbye to the user. The user is always welcome to inquire in the future

start->check_flights->inquire_user_for_info

inquire_user_for_info->inform_no_flights->inquire_user_for_info

inquire_user_for_info->notify_flight_found

notify_flight_found->inquire_flight_ID

notify_flight_found->ask_continue_search

ask_continue_search(yes)->inquire_user_for_info

ask_continue_search(no)->say_goodbye

682b15cd-fb08-4ec6-b8be-3620033aa040.workflow:
Start:
    Send courier
    Current goal: Determine whether the shipment can be shipped
    Description: Ask the user for sender and recipient information, including the sender's name, telephone number, address and the recipient's name, telephone number and address.
    Call getPackageType to determine whether the mail can be sent based on the returned is_sending
    if (Mail cannot be sent) then goto Inform_user_incorrect_info
    if (Mail can be sent) then goto Ask_user_change_info

Inform_user_incorrect_info:
    Current goal: Inform the user of the incorrect information
    Description: Inform the user that the information provided is incorrect. 
    Ask the user whether to change the information or drop the shipment
    if (Drop the shipment) then goto Say_goodbye
    if (Change the information) then goto Determine_shipment

Ask_user_change_info:
    Current goal: Ask the user whether to change the information
    Description: Inform the user that the shipping requirements have been met.
    The user needs to confirm the sender information and recipient information.
    Once the information is established, it cannot be changed. 
    The user has to confirm if he/she wants to change the information
    if (Do not change information) then goto Inform_user_tracking_number
    if (Change the information) then goto Determine_shipment

Inform_user_tracking_number:
    Current goal: Inform the user of the tracking number
    Description: Call sendCourier and tell the user the logistics number based on the returned is_num.
    Confirm if they want to continue sending
    if (NO) then goto Say_goodbye
    if (Yes) then goto Determine_shipment

Say_goodbye:
    Say goodbye to the user
    End

Determine_shipment:
    goto Start

7795cb1c-ed92-476b-9a18-9701645e5da9.workflow:
-> START
    -> QUERY EXPRESS INFORMATION
        : Ask the user for the order number to query
        -> CALL getFullShipmentDetails
            IF Order is not found
                : Tell the user that the order cannot be found. The reason may be that the order number is wrong. The order number needs to be re-provided.
                -> ASK FOR ORDER NUMBER AGAIN
            ELSE IF Order is found
                : Inform the user that the corresponding order information has been successfully found. Tell the user the order information table based on the returned ticket_forms
                IF Item was not delivered
                    : Ask if the user wants to urge logistics or to check the current location of the order
                    IF Rush logistics
                        : Let the user know that we will contact the Courier immediately, and strive for faster delivery
                    ELSE IF View the current location of the order
                        : Tell the user the current position of the order based on the returned is_position
                ELSE IF Item was delivered
                    : Inform the user that the express has been delivered. Ask if he/she has received the delivery.
                    IF Have not received
                        : The user is advised to go to the nearby Cainiao Station to pick up the delivery
                    ELSE IF Received
                        : Ask if the user is satisfied with our express service
                        IF Unsatisfied
                            : Explain to the user that we will redouble our efforts in the future and strive to satisfy them next time
                        ELSE IF Satisfied
                            : Thanks for the user's high comments

0b866d96-bf17-45c4-ae4e-dbc2b1f5898b.workflow:
start: Notebook recommendation and purchase
    --> Does the user have a favorite brand?
    
    does_the_user_have_a_favorite_brand: Ask if the user has a favorite brand
        --> Inform the user about the available brands: Honor, Xiaomi, Asus
        --> Is there a favorite brand?
            Yes:
                --> Recommend a notebook based on the favorite brand
                
                recommend_a_notebook_based_on_the_favorite_brand: Recommend a notebook to the user
                    --> Call nameRecommended
                    --> Tell the user the recommended brand name
                    --> Is the user satisfied with this notebook brand?
                        Not satisfied:
                            --> The brand will be recommended again
                            
                            the_brand_will_be_recommended_again: Recommend again
                                --> Recommend a notebook based on the favorite brand
                                
                        Satisfied:
                            --> Inquire if the user wants to buy
                            
                            inquire_if_the_user_wants_to_buy: Inquire if the user wants to buy it
                                --> Ask for user's desired features: screen size, color, memory capacity
                                --> Call notebookRecommended
                                --> Tell the user the recommended notebook's price
                                --> Does the user want to buy?
                                    Buy:
                                        --> Remind the user to make payment
                                        
                                        remind_the_user_to_make_payment: Remind the user to make payment
                                            --> Share the payment link
                                            --> Help user complete the payment
                                            
                                    Do not buy:
                                        --> Tell the user to think about it
                                        
                                        tell_the_user_to_think_about_it: Tell the user to think about it
                            
            No:
                --> Explain the advantages of the three brands
                
                explain_the_advantages_of_the_three_brands: Explain the advantages of these three brands
                    --> Tell about the benefits: thin, light, easy to carry, high performance
                    --> Is the user willing to consider these brands?
                        Willing to consider:
                            --> Recommend a notebook based on the favorite brand
                            
                        Unwilling to consider:
                            --> Apologize to the user for not being able to recommend a suitable notebook
                            
                            apologize_to_the_user: Apologize to the user

05623f8a-c038-436f-8a15-7912f0d84651.workflow:
start:
    ask "Is the return due to quality issues or seven days with no reason?" -> quality_issues, no_reason

quality_issues:
    call API to inquire about the laptop model and specific problem
    call laptopMaintenance(solution)
    if solution is provided:
        ask "Is the quality problem resolved?" -> resolved, unresolved
    else:
        goto unresolved

resolved:
    inform "You can consult in the future if there are any related problems"
    end

unresolved:
    inform of technician's contact info
    ask "Is the problem solved now?" -> still_unresolved, resolved
    
still_unresolved:
    call returnCondition(is_return)
    if is_return:
        goto satisfied
    else:
        goto unsatisfied

satisfied:
    inform "Return the laptop to the store in Computer City for a check. If not damaged, return will be processed."
    end

unsatisfied:
    inform "Return condition not met, laptop cannot be returned."
    end

no_reason:
    ask "Is the laptop well-packed?" -> well_packed, not_well_packed

well_packed:
    inform "Send the laptop to the store, return will be processed."
    end

not_well_packed:
    inform "Laptop can not be returned unless packaging is in good condition."
    end

6f586cef-ec6f-4b7b-a005-30f535f48283.workflow:
start: Start
    send_an_email()

send_an_email: Current goal: Determine whether the user has an email account
    Description: Ask the user for the ID number and the email address they want to use.
    Call accountInquiry to determine whether the user has an email account based on the returned is_posts
    if (has an email account) then (judge_email_availability)
    else (inform_user_to_register)

judge_email_availability: Current goal: Judge whether the recipient's email address is available
    Description: Ask the user for his/her email account.
    Call emailFeasibility and determine whether emails can be sent to the recipient based on the returned is_sent
    if (NO) then (inform_incorrect_account)
    else (ask_about_sending_email_now)
    
inform_incorrect_account: Current goal: Inform the user of the incorrect account number
    Description: Tell the user that the email cannot be sent because the recipient's email account is incorrect.
    Ask the user if he/she is willing to provide the recipient's email account again
    if (Unwilling to provide again) then (say_goodbye)
    else (judge_email_availability)
    
ask_about_sending_email_now: Current goal: Ask if the user wants to send an email now
    Description: Remind the user to confirm the subject and outline of the email.
    Call writeEmail and inform the user of the edited message based on the returned post_ending.
    And ask the user if they want to send the email now or later
    if (Send the email now) then (send_the_email)
    else (ask_user_draft_box)

send_the_email: Current goal: Send the email
    Description: Call enterEmail to send the email,
    and informs the user that the message has been sent

ask_user_draft_box: Current goal: Ask if the user wants to use the draft box
    Description: Remind the user that he/she can store email content in the draft box,
    when the user edits an email next time, the contents of the draft box can be used directly.
    Ask if the user wants to use the draft box
    if (Want to use the draft box) then (save_in_draft_box)
    else (say_goodbye)
    
save_in_draft_box: Current goal: Save the edited information in the draft box
    Description: Call draftBox to collect edited information,
    and inform the user that it has been stored in the draft box

inform_user_to_register: Current goal: Tell the user to register first
    Description: Inform the user that since there is no email account, he/she needs to register first.
    After registration is complete, login, and then the mailbox can be used to send emails

say_goodbye: Say goodbye to the user

7b1fb560-7939-4bb1-8039-0f037fd5de4a.workflow:
Start: Start
    Ask for user ID and email address
    Call accountInquiry to check for email account
    Has email account?
        Yes:
            Ask for information about the replied email, including sender and sending time
            Call inquireMail to check if email can be found
            Email found?
                Yes:
                    Call EmailResponse to inform user about reply content
                    User wants to reply now?
                        Yes:
                            Call sendEmail for reply
                            Inform user: Email has been successfully replied
                            End
                        No:
                            Inform user: Contact us for email reply
                            End
                No:
                    User can provide email information again?
                        Yes:
                            Go back to the step of asking for information about the replied email
                        No:
                            Inform user: Email could not be found
                            End
        No:
            Inform user: Registration required before using mailbox
            End

f40d5a18-9483-49d1-8d1e-539223773893.workflow:
start: Start
  confirmAmount: Schedule a withdrawal
    if one-time withdrawal amount <= 20,000 RMB:
      findATM: Way to find an ATM
        informATMLocation: Subgoal: inform the ATM location
          searchATMs: Find the nearest ATM
            ->askUserLocation
            ->callFindATM
            ->informNearestATM
    else:
      makeReservation: Make a reservation
        verifyIdentity: Subgoal: verify the user's identity
          ->inquireUserInfo
          ->callVerificeInfo
          if test_value == true:
            confirmWithdrawIntent: Subgoal: confirm the intention to withdraw
              ->callIntentReview
              if is_success == true:
                confirmReservationDetails: Verification passed
                  ->findOutWithdrawAmount
                  ->callReservationCash
                  if reservationCash == true:
                    remindUser: Subgoal: remind the user to withdraw money
                  else:
                    informFailureReasons: Subgoal: inform reasons for the failure
          else:
            ->askForNewIdentificationInfo

e27d36bc-1b76-464f-bbed-c5dbc39dda07.scenario_name: Check the balance and transfer the bank card account
e27d36bc-1b76-464f-bbed-c5dbc39dda07.workflow:
Start
  Handle banking services
    Ask for information
      - ask the user's ID number and bank card account number
      - call queryBank, check the availability of the user's bank account based on the returned is_founding
        Bank account found
          Inform the user of the bank balance based on the returned card_money and ask if the user has any questions about it
            Have questions
              Inform the user about transactions
                - call bankInFormation, inform the user of the last five transactions on the bank card based on the returned card_message
                - The corresponding balance can be viewed in the transaction information
            No questions
              Ask if the user needs other services
                Other services needed
                  Ask whether the user wants to apply for a bank card or transfer a bank card account
                    Apply for a bank card
                      Inform of the online process of applying
                        - remind the user that only the online bank card process is available
                        - The user should first log in to the mobile banking app, click on the option of applying for a bank card, and fill out the application form, which includes name, ID number, contact information, and type of bank card
                        - Require the user to submit an application, call cardProcessing, and check whether the bank card application is successful based on the returned is_attends
                          Application failed
                            Notify that the application failed
                              - inform the user that the application is unsuccessful
                              - The user is required to check the name, ID number, contact information, and bank card type before submitting the information again
                          Application succeeded
                            Tell the user to wait for mailing
                              - inquire the user for the address to receive the card, and collect parameter: card_position
                              - Inform the user that the bank card will be sent by mail according to the returned card_position
                    Bank card account transfer
                      Ask the user to log in to the bank APP on the mobile phone, find the option to change password, then find the function to change password in the security center and other menus, and follow the instructions to change it
                No other services needed
                  Say goodbye to the user
        No bank account found
          Ask the user to reprovide information
            - tell the user that the account number is not found due to possible errors in the ID number and bank card account number
            - Ask if the user would like to provide it again
              Yes
                -> Ask for information
              No
                -> Say goodbye to the user

095a5a47-659f-4725-a029-83883f642982.scenario_name: Make an appointment with a doctor
095a5a47-659f-4725-a029-83883f642982.workflow:
Start: II000
    Make an appointment with a doctor
    Ask if the user knows the desired doctor, appointment time, and the doctor's availability?
        Yes, User all knows -> Call appointmentRegister
            if_success == success
                Inform user: Come to the hospital 15 minutes in advance to pay the registration fee
            else
                Inform user: Reason for appointment failure based on if_success
        No, User doesn't know the doctor's availability -> Call JudgeDoctorSTime
            Doctor is available
                Tell the user that the doctor is available
                Would you like to continue the appointment or check another doctor?
                    Continue the appointment -> Call appointmentRegister (as above)
                    Check another doctor -> Repeat JudgeDoctorSTime
            Doctor is unavailable
                Tell the user that the doctor is unavailable
                Request user to choose another doctor -> Go back to JudgeDoctorSTime
        No, User has no desired doctor -> Call findDoctor
            Inform user about available doctors based on doctor_list
            -> Ask if the user knows the desired doctor, appointment time, and the doctor's availability? (loop back to the beginning of the decision process)

1bf1ee30-d926-43fd-809f-7403004348ae.workflow:
start: Start
    Search for a restaurant
        Subgoal: Check suitable restaurants
            Description: Inquire the user for the location, cuisine preference, and dining time, call searchRestaurant to find restaurants based on the criteria, and confirm suitable restaurants based on the returned data
                No restaurants found
                    Notify the user that no restaurants match the given criteria and ask if the user would like to try again
                        User intends to search for other restaurants => Subgoal: Check suitable restaurants
                        NO => Apologize to the user and say goodbye => end
                Restaurants found
                    Subgoal: Inquire about the user's satisfaction
                        Description: Inform the user that the restaurant has been found, display the list of restaurants and their details based on the returned data, and ask if the user is satisfied
                            User not satisfied with the option
                                Notify the user that other restaurants can be recommended, and ask if the user would like
                                    Need => Subgoal: Check suitable restaurants
                                    NO need => Apologize to the user and say goodbye => end
                            User satisfied with the option
                                Tell the user of the restaurant location based on the returned address, and ask the user to go to the restaurant to experience it => end

2dfe18d3-125b-4587-a2b6-03546ec751f0.workflow:
start: Start
    Search for products
    confirm needs and search for products
    inquire the user about product type, brand, price lower limit, price upper limit, and other product needs
    -> call searchProducts
    -> check whether suitable products can be found based on the returned is_finding
        if No suitable product found:
            ask to adjust the demand
            inform the user that no products meet the given needs
            -> ask if the user would like to change product requirements
                if Do not change requirements:
                    apologies to the user
                    -> tell the user that there are no suitable products and apologize
                    -> end
                else Change requirements:
                    -> confirm needs and search for products [back to search]
        else Suitable product found:
            show goods to the user
            inform the user of the product according to the returned apartment_message
            -> ask if the user is satisfied with the product
                if User is satisfied:
                    -> Ask if the user is willing to buy
                        if User will buy:
                            add products to the shopping cart
                            -> call addCart to add the current item to the shopping cart
                            -> inform the user of the results of joining based on the returned add_result
                            -> end
                        else User will not buy:
                            -> Inquiry the user about reasons for unwilling to buy
                            -> collect parameters: is_reason
                            -> persuade the user to consider other items
                else User is unsatisfied:
                    persuade the user to consider other items
                    -> inform the user that there are a wide variety of products
                    -> can fully satisfy the user's experience
                    -> ask if they want to know about other products
                        if Yes:
                            -> confirm needs and search for products [back to search]
                        else NO:
                            -> apologies to the user [flow ends]

a908ae8d-9758-4a3f-adaa-f0846a361775.workflow:
Start
    Call lookShopCart to get shopping cart information
    Tell user the contents of their shopping cart
Ask user if they want to check out, continue purchasing, or modify the shopping cart
if the user wants to modify the shopping cart
    Call changeShopCart to modify the shopping cart
    If modification involves the model, delete and repurchase
    Tell user the updated contents of their shopping cart
    Go back to asking user if they want to check out, continue purchasing, or modify the shopping cart
else if the user chooses to check out
    Inquire the user about the product they checked out
    Call shopCartCheckout after the user confirms twice
    Tell the user the amount based on the returned money
    Ask the user if they want to use account balance or a link to pay
    if the user chooses to use account balance
        Call useAccountBalance to verify account balance and pay
        if payment is successful (pay_result is yes)
            Let the user know payment is successful and the merchant is being notified
        else
            Tell the user that the balance is insufficient
            Ask if they want to use the link to pay
    if the user chooses to use the link to pay or if balance was insufficient
        Call linkPay to get payment information and payment link
        if the returned result_pay is success
            Let the user know that the payment is successful and the merchant is being notified
        else
            Inform the user of the payment link and ask them to pay
            Ask the user if the payment is completed
            if payment is completed
                Go back to checking if the returned result_pay is success
            else
                Tell the user they need to pay within 24 hours, or the order will be canceled

8173ea61-ee58-4213-abe2-a1fa14c160f0.workflow:
start: Start
  Print documents

confirm_file_location: Current goal: Confirm the file location
  Description: Ask if the files printed by the user are uploaded to the company's system.
  Files need to be uploaded to the company's system and must be reviewed before being printed,
  preventing some documents that cannot be printed but are printed

not_uploaded: Current goal: Let the user upload files
  Description: Tell the user to upload files beforehand,
  and tell us to print them after obtaining the file ID. This is for auditing.

uploaded: Current goal: Confirm the number of copies printed and other requirements
  Description: Ask if the user has other printing needs, such as color requirements.
  If not, then the document is printed in black and white, one copy.

schedule_print: Current goal: Schedule a print
  Description: Call getPrint, select the parameters according to the user's needs, and enter the parameters.
  After the call is completed, determine whether the returned is_success is normal or incorrect.
  If the returned is_success is an error, the file was not found.

inform_printing: Current goal: Inform printing matters
  Description: Tell the user that files have been obtained.
  The documents will be reviewed first,
  and then be printed after it has been approved.

file_error: Current goal: Tell the user about the file error.
  Description: Inform the user that the file was not searchable 
  because it contains content that cannot be printed.
  The user needs to double-check the documents and re-upload them before letting stuff know.

start -> confirm_file_location
confirm_file_location -> not_uploaded -> uploaded -> schedule_print
confirm_file_location -> uploaded
schedule_print -> inform_printing
schedule_print -> file_error

594e07e2-4189-4655-9a42-a9e07c511629.workflow:
Start:
    Notify the file result
    goto Confirm_User_Identity

Confirm_User_Identity:
    # Current goal: Confirm the user's identity
    # Description: Ask for the identity of the employee who answered the phone,
    # including name and employee number.
    # Call getEmployeeStatus to get the employee status,
    # and judge the identity of the employee based on the returned employee_name and employee_num.
    # If the identity is correct, the employee will be informed of the result of the document printing.
    # Only if the identity is correct, the following steps can be proceeded.
    # If the identity is wrong, apologize to the user.
    if identity is correct:
        goto Get_File_Print_Result
    else:
        Apologize to the user
        end

Get_File_Print_Result:
    # Current goal: Get the result of the file print
    # Description: Call getPrintResults to get the file print result,
    # and according to the returned is_result
    # to determine whether the application is successful or not.
    if application is successful:
        goto Confirm_Document_Pages
    else:
        goto Inform_Application_Failure

Confirm_Document_Pages:
    # Current goal: Confirm the number of pages in the document
    # Description: We need to confirm the number of pages in the file with the user
    # so that we don't give the wrong file and cause information leakage.
    # Query the number of pages of the user's file based on the returned page_num.
    # The user cannot be told the correct answer.
    if answer is correct:
        goto Ask_How_To_Get_File
    else:
        goto Inform_Delivery_Failure

Ask_How_To_Get_File:
    # Subgoal: Ask the user how to get the file
    # Description: The user can go to the pickup location to pick the file up on his/her own,
    # or it can also be delivered by our staff.
    # The user needs to give clear requirements.
    if pick up on his/her own:
        goto Inform_Pickup_Location
    else if delivered by staff:
        goto Collect_User_Workstation_Location
    else:
        Inform unclear requirements
        end

Inform_Delivery_Failure:
    # Current goal: Tell the failure of delivering of the file
    # Description: Let the user know that the number of pages of the document provided is inconsistent
    # Deliveries are not possible in accordance with the Company's regulations.
    # If in doubt, the user can contact the person in charge of document printing for details.
    Inform failure details
    end

Inform_Pickup_Location:
    # Current goal: Inform the pick-up location
    # Description: The user is told the location where the file is currently stored
    # and its pickup number.
    # The user needs to pick up the file in time.
    Inform pickup details
    end

Collect_User_Workstation_Location:
    # Current goal: Collect user workstation locations
    # Description: Collect the location of the user's workstation and collect the parameter: work_place.
    # Tell the user that the delivery of the document is about to be scheduled
    # and the user needs to wait at the desk.
    # If there is no one at the workstation at the time of delivery, the delivery will not be made.
    Collect workstation details
    Inform delivery scheduling
    end

Inform_Application_Failure:
    # Current goal: Inform the reason for the failure of the application
    # Description: There can be two reasons for the application failure.
    # The first is the file is not up to specification.
    # The second is the file volume is too large.
    # The user can contact the person in charge of document printing to understand the situation and then re-apply.
    Inform failure reasons
    end

f9da7809-38d8-43bb-b6fd-fd3cf110ada2.workflow:
start: Start
ask_service: Ask if the user wants to check the weather or turn on weather reminders

if (ask_service == "Turn on weather reminders") then
    inform_reminder_options: Inform the user that morning and evening weather reminders and unusual weather reminders are provided, and ask the user if desired one
    if (inform_reminder_options == "Unusual weather reminders") then
        inform_unusual_weather: Tell the user that imminent changes in rainfall and air quality will be detected in time and such messages will be sent to him/her timely
    else if (inform_reminder_options == "Morning and evening weather reminders") then
        inform_daily_weather: Notify the user that weather news of today/tomorrow will be sent to him/her at 7:00/19:00 every day
    endif
else if (ask_service == "Weather check") then
    inquire_location_date: Inquire about the location and date, call getWeatherForecast, and confirm if the corresponding weather data can be found based on the returned status
    if (inquire_location_date == "Weather data available") then
        inform_weather_available: Inform the user of the availability of weather data, display weather forecast based on the returned weather_dict and ask if the user needs another location or date
        if (inform_weather_available == "Check continued") then
            goto inquire_location_date
        else if (inform_weather_available == "No further check required") then
            say_goodbye: Say goodbye to the user
        endif
    else if (inquire_location_date == "No weather data available") then
        inform_no_data: Inform the user that the corresponding weather data is not available because of status, and ask if the user wants to continue the check
        if (inform_no_data == "Check continued") then
            goto inquire_location_date
        else if (inform_no_data == "No further check required") then
            goto say_goodbye
        endif
    endif
endif

6727cdb8-f374-4db8-b59b-8f48f7ba0250.workflow:
start: Start
    Search for a hotel -> findAvailableHotels
    
findAvailableHotels: Subgoal: Find available hotels
    Description: Ask the user for destination, dates, and preferences, call API:searchHotel to retrieve hotels based on the given criteria
    Available hotels found -> displayHotels
    No available hotels found -> noHotelsFound
    
noHotelsFound: Subgoal: No hotels found
    Description: Inform the user that no hotels match the given requirements, and ask if the user would like to reselect a hotel
    Reselect -> findAvailableHotels
    No need to reselect -> apologize
    
apologize: Apologize to the user for not being able to provide a suitable hotel
    -> end
    
displayHotels: Display the list of available hotels based on the returned data, ask if the user is satisfied with the hotel offered
    User is satisfied with the option -> askForRating
    User is not satisfied with the option -> recommendOtherHotels
    
askForRating: Subgoal: Ask the user for rating
    Description: Inform the user that the search is complete, and ask for an evaluation of this service. Criteria are categorized as good, fair, or poor for users to choose
    Good -> thankForGoodReview
    Fair or poor -> inquireReason
    No review -> thankForUsingService
    
thankForGoodReview: Thanks for the good review the user gives, and the user is welcome for further inquiries.
    -> end
    
inquireReason: Subgoal: Inquire reasons
    Description: Inquire about the reason for not giving a positive review, collect parameter: person_reason, inform the user that corrections will be made based on reasons, and thank the user for using this service
    -> end
    
thankForUsingService: Thank the user for using this service and say goodbye
    -> end
    
recommendOtherHotels: Subgoal: Whether the user accepts recommendations
    Description: Inform the user that this hotel may not match the given requirements, but other hotels can be recommended, and ask if the user needs
    Yes -> findAvailableHotels
    NO -> thankForUsingService

end: End

6ecb63f6-74ce-4f9a-bdcb-d25c04dce41a.workflow:
start: IW000
    Book a hotel room
    -> Confirm room availability

Confirm room availability: IW001
    Ask the user for the hotel name and number of rooms required
    Call API:checkHotelAvailability to check room information
    IF Rooms available
        -> Notify user rooms are available
    ELSE
        -> Invitation to book another hotel

Notify user rooms are available: IW002
    Notify the user that rooms are available, and ask the user to confirm the booking
    IF User has not confirmed
        -> Require the user to consider
    ELSE IF User confirms
        -> Whether the booking is successful

Require the user to consider: IW006
    Inform the user that once a booking is confirmed, it cannot be changed
    The user is required to think carefully and quickly before replying
    -> Notify user rooms are available

Whether the booking is successful: IW005
    Ask the user for personal details and payment info
    Call API:bookHotel to make the reservation
    IF True
        -> Inform the user that the hotel has been successfully reserved
    ELSE
        -> Try again

Try again: IW004
    Notify the user of reservation failure and its reasons
    Ask the user to try again
    -> Whether the booking is successful

Inform the user that the hotel has been successfully reserved: IW008
    Inform the user about the successful reservation

Invitation to book another hotel: IW003
    Apologize to the user for the unavailability of rooms
    Inquire if they would like to consider booking at a different hotel
    IF Yes
        -> Confirm room availability
    ELSE
        -> Apologize for not being able to offer a suitable hotel

Apologize for not being able to offer a suitable hotel: IW007
    Apologize to the user for not being able to offer a suitable hotel
    Say goodbye to the user

acb85afe-23c5-49b5-b66a-9615b1df0260.workflow:
start: Start
    Book a hotel -> confirm_hotels

confirm_hotels: Subgoal: Confirm available hotels.
    Description: Ask for the hotel name where the user is staying, 
    call API: getHotelInfo to retrieve hotel details,
    and confirm available hotels based on the returned success
        Hotel found -> reservation_decision
        Hotel unfound -> hotel_name_error

reservation_decision: Subgoal: Whether the user makes a reservation
    Description: Call appointmentFee,
    inform the user of the reservation fee based on the returned hotel_fee,
    and ask if the user wants to make a reservation for this hotel
        User has not confirm -> take_time_to_think
        User confirms -> reservation_success_check

take_time_to_think: Inform the user that taking time to think is allowed before replying
    -> end

reservation_success_check: Subgoal: Whether the reservation is successful
    Description: Inform the user of the payment link for the reservation fee based on pay_fee and request the user to complete the payment.
    Call appointment_Fee5 to organize the requested services,
    and check whether the service result is 'true' or not based on the returned service_scheduled
        True -> inform_room_number
        Reservation failed -> retry_or_quit_decision

inform_room_number: Inform the user of the room number based on the returned room_info
    -> end

hotel_name_error: Inform the user that there is an error in the provided hotel name,
    and request the user to provide a new hotel name
        User reprovides -> confirm_hotels

retry_or_quit_decision: Subgoal: Whether the user tries again
    Description: Inform the user of the failed reservation and its reasons based on the returned room_info,
    and ask if the user wants to reselect the hotel name and make a reservation
        User wants to try again -> confirm_hotels
        User does not want to retry -> apologize_and_goodbye

apologize_and_goodbye: Apologize to the user and say goodbye
    -> end

b8a59056-00a4-4457-aa4f-f361ece37b1f.workflow:
Start
    Use a seal
        Current goal: Confirm seal type
            Description: Seal types include:
                - Official seal
                - Financial seal
                - Invoice seal
                - Contract seal
                - Invoice seal
            Confirm which type of seal the user needs?
                Official seal
                    Current goal: Decide if an official seal is required
                        Description: The official seal can be used for all letters, official documents, contracts, letters of introduction, certificates or other company materials issued in the name of the company.
                        The official seal is not required in other cases.
                            Stamp is required
                                GOTO Confirm document type
                            Stamp is not required
                                GOTO Inform that there's no need to stamp
                Financial seal or contract seal
                    Current goal: Tell the user that the seal is not for external use
                        Description: Tell the user that the financial seal and contract seal are for exclusive use, not for external printing service.
                Invoice seal
                    Current goal: Ask for invoice type
                        Description: Ask the user whether it is an electronic invoice or a paper invoice.
                        If it is an electronic invoice, is the word 'Seller (Seal)' in the lower right corner of the invoice?
                        If not, it means that the electronic ticket does not need to be stamped.
                        If it is other types, it needs to be stamped.
                            Stamp is required
                                GOTO Confirm document type
                            Stamp is not required
                                GOTO Inform that there's no need to stamp
    Confirm document type
        Current goal: Confirm document type
            Description: Confirm whether the document to be stamped is an electronic document or a paper document.
                Paper document
                    Current goal: Teach the user how to stamp paper documents
                        Description: Inform the user that the financial office will stamp paper documents.
                        The user needs to contact the head of the company about the location of the finance office.
                Electronic document
                    Current goal: Request stamping
                        Description: Call applicationStamp to apply for a stamp. After the correct call, tell the user that the invoice seal will show the result after three hours, or six hours in the case of an official seal.
    Inform that there's no need to stamp
        Current goal: Inform that there's no need to stamp
            Description: Inform the user that the required print request cannot be approved according to company regulations.
            The main reason is that the application for a seal is not justified and does not meet the company's requirements or the use of a seal does not belong to the company regulations.

1e9503fd-0460-4d53-bb02-80dc443cfee2.workflow:
start: Start
results_reporting: Results reporting
    :Current goal: Confirm the user identity
    :Description: Ask for the identity of the employee who answered the phone, including name and work number.
    :Then call getEmployeeStatus to get the identity of the employee, 
    :and judge the employee's identity based on the returned employee_name and employess_num.
    :If the identity is correct, this employee needs to be informed of the result of the print request and the following steps to be taken. 
    :If the identity is incorrect, apologize to the user.
    if (Identity is correct) then (yes)
        get_print_result: Current goal: Get print result
        :Description: Call getPrintingResults to get the printing result, 
        :and determine whether the application is successful or failed based on the returned is_result.
        if (Application is successful) then (yes)
            ask_pickup_method: Current goal: Ask the user how to pick up the document
            :Description: The user can go to the pick-up location or the document can be delivered to the user.
            :Ask the user to give a clear indication.
            if (Collect the document on their own) then (yes)
                tell_pickup_location: Current goal: Tell the pick-up location
                :Description: Inform the user of relevant information based on the returned getPrintingResults, 
                :including the current location of the file based on the returned locations
                :and its pickup number based on the returned pick_up_number.
                :Ask the user to pick up the document.
                end
            else (Delivery of the document)
                collect_workstation_info: Current goal: Collect the user's workstation
                :Description: Know about the location of the user's workstation, and collect the parameter: work_place.
                :Tell the user that the delivery of the document is about to be scheduled. Ask the user to wait at the workstation. 
                :If there is no one at the workplace at the time of delivery, it will not be delivered.
                end
            endif
        else (no)
            notify_failure: Current goal: Notification of reasons for unsuccessful application
            :Description: There may be two reasons for application failure.
            :The first is that the document does not meet the specification.
            :The second is that the applying information is not sufficient.
            :Let the user contact the person in charge of printing for information and then apply again.
            end
        endif
    else (no)
        apologize: Apologize to the user
        end
    endif

5c7032fe-6c0c-4a2d-8c43-cc6e006aa387.workflow:
Start:
  Ask if the user is aware of any early leave or tardiness
    -> Unaware
    -> Aware

Unaware:
  Inquire if the user has checked in
    -> Did check in
    -> Did not check in

Did check in:
  Notify that the check-in failed
    -> END

Did not check in:
  Ask for the reason for early leave/tardiness
    -> Face recognition failure
    -> Forgot to check in
    -> Other reasons

Aware:
  Ask for the reason for early leave/tardiness
    -> Face recognition failure
    -> Forgot to check in
    -> Other reasons

Face recognition failure:
  Collect user's facial information
    -> END

Forgot to check in:
  Examine frequency of forgetfulness
    -> Exceeds three times
    -> Does not exceed three times

Exceeds three times:
  Inform user of excess tardiness
    -> END

Does not exceed three times:
  Remind the user of timing
    -> END

Other reasons:
  Collect other reasons
    -> END

11fd35e3-a085-46ac-8321-47018196b9d9.workflow:
start: Start
    relieve -> confirm_identity

confirm_identity: Current goal: Confirm the user's identity
    Description: Call getUserInfo to confirm the user's identity, and determine whether the user identity is correct or not based on the returned back_code
    Correct identity -> inquire_shift_transfer_deadline
    Mistaken identity -> deny_service

inquire_shift_transfer_deadline: Current goal: Inquire about shift transfer deadline
    Description: Ask the user about the shift transfer deadline. Is the shift time within three days 'inclusive' or beyond three days?
    Within three days -> ask_successor
    Beyond three days -> apply_in_writing

deny_service: Current goal: Denial of services
    Description: The user's identity is incorrect, so the user's request for a shift transfer is denied.
    -> end

ask_successor: Current goal: Ask who will take over
    Description: Ask if the user has found a successor, who must be another employee of the same level in the company
    No successor found -> user_needs_help
    A successor found -> collect_shift_information

apply_in_writing: Current goal: apply in writing
    Description: Tell the user that the shift time has exceeded three days and a written application needs to be made by the supervisor.
    -> end

user_needs_help: Current goal: Ask if the user needs help
    Description: Ask if the user needs our help or continues to look for a successor on their own?
    Find the successor on the user's own -> user_find_successors
    Find the successor here -> find_exchangeable_times

collect_shift_information: Current goal: Collect shift information
    Description: Call collectShiftInformation to collect shift information, and inform the user to have the successor contact us for a shift transfer and fill out the information
    -> end

user_find_successors: Current goal: Let the user find his/her successors
    Description: The user is asked to find his/her successors.
    -> end

find_exchangeable_times: Current goal: Find exchangeable times
    Description: Call getCanExchanged to obtain information on exchangeable employees, and check whether the information is empty based on the returned worker_object
    Information is not empty -> user_contact_employees
    Information is empty -> ask_upload_information

user_contact_employees: Current goal: Ask the user to contact on his/her own
    Description: Tell the user the employee information in the worker_object, and let the user reach out on his/her own.
    -> end

ask_upload_information: Current goal: Ask if the user will upload information
    Description: Tell the user that no other employee has posted a shift request, and ask if the user needs to upload information. After uploading information, other employees can see the user's application.
    Information uploaded -> upload_user_requests
    No information uploaded -> apologize_to_user

upload_user_requests: Current goal: Upload the user's requests
    Description: Call uploadUserRequest to upload the user's requests, and tell the user to be patient
    -> end

apologize_to_user: Current goal: Apologize to the user
    Description: Apologize to the user for the unsatisfactory service provided to the user
    -> end

0a560d1f-cccd-4dc4-b229-95a2c28f0953.workflow:
Start:
    if "Check the ticket":
        -> Check_the_ticket()
    elif "SMS import tickets":
        -> Validate_new_ticket()
    elif "Send tickets":
        -> Send_ticket_to_mailbox()

Check_the_ticket():
    lookTicket()
    -> Tell_user_ticket_contents()

Tell_user_ticket_contents():
    Print "Inform user the specifics of the ticket from ticket_dict"
    Print "Inform the returned ticket_ai to the user"
    Ask "Does the user want to know about one of the invoices?"
    if yes:
        Explain "the details of the invoice"

Validate_new_ticket():
    SMS_content = getUserSMSContent()
    is_exist = checkTicket(SMS_content)
    if is_exist == true:
        -> Import_new_ticket()
    else:
        -> Inform_no_tickets()

Import_new_ticket():
    inBar()
    Print "New ticket imported into the user's ticket package"

Inform_no_tickets():
    Print "No valid tickets found in SMS. Please re-check the SMS content."

Send_ticket_to_mailbox():
    is_success = sendTicket(email_address)
    if is_success == true:
        Print "Ticket sent successfully to the email address."
    else:
        Print "Failed to send ticket. Please check the email address."

1e056ba1-4084-4ad6-8db7-276cd2ecd51b.scenario_name: Consultation and appointment for Substitute driving service

cc734648-5ba6-4039-b357-c57b7495693e.workflow:
Start:
    Cancel appointments of substitute driving
    goto DetermineReservationInformation

DetermineReservationInformation:
    Subgoal: Determine if the reservation information can be found
    Description: Ask the user for the reservation information, including the ID number and the specific time of the appointment. Call getReservation to query. Determine whether the corresponding reservation information can be found based on the returned is_founding.
    if (Reservation information can not be found) then goto InquireUserDecision
    if (Reservation information can be found) then goto ConfirmCancellation

InquireUserDecision:
    Current goal: Inquire the user to make an appointment or look it up again
    Description: Tell that the corresponding appointment information was not found. The information can only be found after making an appointment. Ask if the user wants to make an appointment or look it up again
    decision:
    if (Make an appointment) then goto InformAboutAppointmentProcedure
    if (Look up again) then goto DetermineReservationInformation
    if (Neither is carried out) then goto SayGoodbye


InformAboutAppointmentProcedure:
    The user will be informed later by a dedicated staff member on how to make an appointment
    goto End

SayGoodbye:
    Current goal: Say goodbye to the user
    Description: Inform that the user is welcome to consult again if there are any needs. Then say goodbye to the user
    goto End

ConfirmCancellation:
    Inquire if the user is sure to cancel the appointment
    decision:
    if (Not sure) then goto ConsiderCarefully
    if (Sure) then goto DetermineCancellationSuccess

ConsiderCarefully:
    Advise the user to consider carefully
    goto ConfirmCancellation

DetermineCancellationSuccess:
    Current goal: Call the API to determine whether the cancellation is successful
    Description: Call cancelReservation and judge if the cancellation is successful based on the returned is_quit
    if (Cancellation is successful) then goto InformSuccess
    if (Cancellation is unsuccessful) then goto InformUnsuccessfulReason

InformSuccess:
    Inform the user that the cancellation was successful
    goto End

InformUnsuccessfulReason:
    Tell the user of the reason for the unsuccessful cancellation based on the returned is_reason
    goto End

End:

00eb0b19-2092-48a3-811c-530f52171e8f.workflow:
start: Start
    find_appointment_info

find_appointment_info: Current goal: Determine whether the reservation information can be found.
    Description: Ask the user for appointment information that includes ID number and specific time of reservation. Call findReservation to make a query, and determine whether the corresponding reservation information can be found based on the returned is_finding
    if (Information can not be found) then goto inform_no_find
    if (Information can be found) then goto ask_change_confirmation

inform_no_find: Current goal: Inform that the information was not found
    Description: Inform the user that the reservation information could not be found, and advise that the reservation information can only be found if an appointment is made, and ask the user if they need to look it up again
    if (Needed) then goto find_appointment_info
    if (Not needed) then goto say_goodbye

ask_change_confirmation: Current goal: Ask the user if he/she wants to change information
    Description: Inform the user that the reservation information has been successfully found. Ask if the user confirms that he/she wants to change it
    if (Confirmed to change) then goto check_change_success
    if (Not confirmed to change) then goto ask_to_think_over

ask_to_think_over: Ask the user to think it over before telling us
    goto find_appointment_info

check_change_success: Current goal: Determine if the change is successful
    Description: Ask the user for the origin and destination that need to be changed, and call changeReservation to determine if the change was successful based on the returned is_success
    if (Change is successful) then goto inform_change_success
    if (Change is unsuccessful) then goto ask_change_again

inform_change_success: Inform the user that the change has been successful
    goto say_goodbye

ask_change_again: Current goal: Ask the user whether to change again
    Description: Tell the user that the change is unsuccessful, and inform the user of the reason why the change was not successful based on the returned main_reason. Ask the user whether to change the information again
    if (Yes) then goto check_change_success
    if (NO) then goto say_goodbye

say_goodbye: Say goodbye to the user
    end

ca37c286-01eb-481c-8b63-5bebd28fad75.workflow:
start: 
    Book a ride
    Confirm suitable ride availability
        Inquire about the user's name, drop-off destination, and ride time
        Call searchAvailableRides
        Confirm suitable ride availability based on the returned rides
    if Rides available:
        Confirm the selection
            Present available rides to the user
            Inquire about a selection based on the returned vehicle_type
            User is required to confirm the selection of this type
            if User confirms the selection:
                Ask for rating
                    Call confirmBooking to make a reservation
                    Provide booking details based on booking_confirmation
                    Ask for an evaluation of this service (excellent, good, fair, very poor)
                    if Excellent:
                        Express gratitude
                            Express gratitude to the user
                            Efforts will be made to improve services
                    elif Good or fair or very poor:
                        Thanks for the user's comments
                            Notify that efforts will be made to satisfy next time
                    else No review:
                        Apologize to the user and say goodbye
            else User not confirm the selection:
                Inform the user that the selection cannot be changed
                The user is required to think carefully before replying
    else No rides available:
        Invite the user to reselect
            Tell the user no suitable rides are available
            Invite to re-supply name, drop-off, and ride time
            if Yes:
                goto Confirm suitable ride availability
            else NO:
                Apologize to the user and say goodbye

79c7091b-cc86-46d8-8542-4ec75e882600.workflow:
Start: HF000
    Ride change
    -> Confirm changes availability [HF001]

Confirm changes availability [HF001]
    Description: Ask for the number of people transferring, boarding time, and boarding location.
    Call lookTransferVehicle and confirm if changes are possible based on the returned vehicle_info.
    -> Change possible
        -> Inform user of availability [HF006]
    -> Change not possible
        -> Invitation to re-supply information [HF003]
        
Inform user of availability [HF006]
    Inform the user of currently available changes based on the returned vehicle_info, and ask if the user selects one?
    -> User selects one
        -> Reservation successful [HF005]
    -> User does not select
        -> Ask if the user needs to change requirements? [HF002]
        
Reservation successful [HF005]
    Notify user that the reservation is successful, and collect parameter: use_phone. The user will receive a call when the car is about to arrive.
    -> End

Ask if the user needs to change requirements? [HF002]
    -> Change confirmed
        -> Confirm changes availability [HF001]
    -> User does not change
        -> Apologize to user [HF004]
        
Invitation to re-supply information [HF003]
    Inform the user that there are no suitable changes based on the given information and search for appropriate information.
    The user is invited to re-supply the number of people transferring, boarding time, and boarding location to confirm again.
    -> Yes
        -> Confirm changes availability [HF001]
    -> NO
        -> Apologize to user [HF004]
        
Apologize to user [HF004]
    Subgoal: Apologize to the user
    Description: Apologize to the user for the few cars and difficulty in hailing rides, and thank the user for choosing this service. The user is recommended to contact again in half an hour if necessary.
    -> End
